articles.author: Anna Kelsey-Sugg
articles.title: The 'drug grannies' thought they were on the trip of a lifetime. They couldn't have been more mistaken - ABC News
articles.description: In 1977, two American retirees set out on a campervan trip. When the women tried to go home, they were threatened with violence, and a three-month holiday turned into a 14-year prison sentence.
articles.content:
Americans Vera Todd Hays and Florice Bessire never planned to end up in Australia; less still, an Australian prison.
After the retirees headed off on a campervan holiday in 1977, many things happene… [+10932 chars]
